column3: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
Faith gives you an inner strength and a sense of balance and perspective in life.
Power over others is weakness disguised as strength.
Thank you to all for your prayers and good wishes. It gave me the strength to persevere and warmed my heart.
My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.

When we meet real tragedy in life, we can react in two ways - either by losing hope and falling into self-destructive habits, or by using the challenge to find our inner strength. Thanks to the teachings of Buddha, I have been able to take this second way.
A strong woman is a woman determined to do something others are determined not be done.
Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
You can't get around pain and opposition, but you can try to be joyful in the trial, and thank yourself for the trial, and thank God for the strength to get through it.

Looking ahead, I believe that the underlying importance of higher education, of science, of technology, of research and scholarship to our quality of life, to the strength of our economy, to our security in many dimensions will continue to be the most important message.
Our ability to handle life's challenges is a measure of our strength of character.
The apple cannot be stuck back on the Tree of Knowledge; once we begin to see, we are doomed and challenged to seek the strength to see more, not less.
If I didn't define myself for myself, I would be crunched into other people's fantasies for me and eaten alive.
This is the mark of a really admirable man: steadfastness in the face of trouble.
I like criticism. It makes you strong.
The five separate fingers are five independent units. Close them and the fist multiplies strength. This is organization.
Do you really think it is weakness that yields to temptation? I tell you that there are terrible temptations which it requires strength, strength and courage to yield to.
If we resist our passions, it is more due to their weakness than our strength.

I was in uniform for four years, and I know that heroism doesn't occur from taking orders, but rather from people who through their own willpower and strength are willing to sacrifice their lives for an idea.

I am an example of what is possible when girls from the very beginning of their lives are loved and nurtured by people around them. I was surrounded by extraordinary women in my life who taught me about quiet strength and dignity.
I know that, like every woman of the people, I have more strength than I appear to have.
Wondrous is the strength of cheerfulness, and its power of endurance - the cheerful man will do more in the same time, will do it; better, will preserve it longer, than the sad or sullen.
If the leader is filled with high ambition and if he pursues his aims with audacity and strength of will, he will reach them in spite of all obstacles.
When you have a wife who has been a tower of strength and shown more courage than you dreamed existed - that's the finest I know.
